title: Space to breathe
creator_credit: Geoffrey Thompson and Geoffrey Thompson Productions
brief_description: Looks at the many fine parks around inner Melbourne and also shows that large areas of unspoiled landscape have been set aside to provide the city of Melbourne with an extensive Metropolitan Parks system. (Includes a brief appearance of the then Premier of Victoria, Mr Rupert Hamer.)
